'''Peony Baggins''' (born {{SR|1350}}) was a Hobbit of the Shire.

==History==
Peony was a daughter of [[Posco Baggins]] and [[Gilly Brownlock]], the younger sister of [[Ponto Baggins II|Ponto]] and [[Porto Baggins|Porto]]. She married [[Milo Burrows]] and they had several children: [[Mosco Burrows|Mosco]], [[Moro Burrows|Moro]], [[Myrtle Burrows|Myrtle]] and [[Minto Burrows|Minto]]. With her family she attended [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>
==Etymology==
[[wikipedia:Peony|Peony]] is a genus of the buttercup family of perennial plants with flowers.
